name: PBF Energy Inc.
description: PBF Energy Inc. is a leading independent petroleum refining company based in the United States. Established in 2008, PBF focuses on the acquisition and operation of complex refineries that can efficiently process a variety of crude oils, including both light and heavy grades. The company operates several refineries across North America, including facilities in Louisiana, Delaware, and Ohio, which collectively have a significant capacity to produce a wide range of refined petroleum products. These products include gasoline, diesel, jet fuel, and other specialty products, serving both the domestic and international markets. PBF is committed to operational excellence and environmental stewardship, employing advanced technologies and practices to enhance efficiency and reduce emissions. Additionally, the company is actively involved in the logistics and transportation of crude oil and refined products, ensuring a robust supply chain. PBF's mission is to deliver high-quality products while maintaining a focus on safety, sustainability, and community engagement.
